pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partially Observed Integrated Functional Depth // Integrated Depths for Partially Observed Functional Data (PoFD). Applications to visualization, outlier detection and classification. Software companion for Elas, Antonio, Jimnez, Ral, Paganoni, Anna M. and Sangalli, Laura M., (2020), "Integrated Depth for Partially Observed Functional Data".
